gist.headline: Go fetch the LLMs
gist.blurb: A new minimal Go client joins the hive. Standard library only, no heavy dependencies, just pure connectivity.
gist.summary: Added LLM Client, a lightweight standard-library-only Go client for OpenAI-compatible endpoints, to the Dev Tools collection.
gist.impact: Go developers gain a unified, dependency-free interface for integrating LLM capabilities into their applications.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the bee meeting a cute pixel art gopher (representing the Go language). The gopher is holding a very small, lightweight package (representing the minimal client).
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot greeting a small, cute pixelated gopher character. The gopher holds a tiny, glowing lime green (#ecf874) data packet. Soft pastel gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, chunky sprites.
